user.title: Search for cryptocurrencies
user.description: Search for cryptocurrencies by name, symbol, or ID. Leave empty to browse the top 100.

data_description.search_query: Enter a cryptocurrency name, symbol, or ID to search. Example: bitcoin, btc, ethereum

select_crypto.title: Select cryptocurrencies
select_crypto.description: Select one or more cryptocurrencies to track.

data_description.selected_cryptos: Select the cryptocurrencies you want to track

data_description.id: Unique name for this sensor (e.g., 'My Wallet', 'Trading Portfolio').
data_description.currency_name: Currency to display prices in (usd, eur, gbp, etc.).
data_description.unit_of_measurement: Currency symbol to display (e.g., $, €, £). Leave empty for none.
data_description.multipliers: Amount of each cryptocurrency you own, separated by commas. Must match the number of selected cryptocurrencies.
data_description.update_frequency: How often to refresh prices (minutes). Minimum 1 minute.
data_description.min_time_between_requests: Minimum delay between API requests (minutes). Shared across all sensors.

data_description.currency_name: One of the currency names in [this list](https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/simple/supported_vs_currencies).
data_description.cryptocurrency_ids: The 'id' values from one or more of the coins/tokens in [this list](https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/list), separated by commas.
data_description.unit_of_measurement: Do you want to use a currency symbol? ([Symbol list](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Currency_symbol#List_of_currency_symbols_currently_in_use))
data_description.multipliers: The number of coins/tokens (separated by a comma). The number of multipliers must match the number of cryptocurrency IDs.
data_description.update_frequency: How often should the value be refreshed? Beware of the [CoinGecko rate limit](https://support.coingecko.com/hc/en-us/articles/4538771776153-What-is-the-rate-limit-for-CoinGecko-API-public-plan) when tracking multiple cryptocurrencies.
data_description.min_time_between_requests: The minimum time between the other entities and this entity to make a data request to the API. (This property is shared and the same for every entity.)

abort.already_configured: A sensor with this name (Identifier) already exists

error.mismatch_values: The number of cryptocurrency id's ({crypto_count}) does not match the number of multipliers ({multiplier_count})
error.invalid_cryptocurrency_ids: The following cryptocurrency IDs are not valid in CoinGecko: {invalid_ids}. Please check the list at https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/list
error.no_crypto_selected: Please select at least one cryptocurrency
error.no_results: No cryptocurrencies found matching your search. Please try a different search term.
